.. _class_NavigationObstacle2D:

====================

æè¿°

éšœç¢ç‰©éœ€è¦å¯¼èˆªåœ°å›¾å’Œè½®å»“é¡¶ç‚¹ :ref:`vertices<class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_vertices>` æ‰èƒ½å¤Ÿæ­£å¸¸å·¥ä½œã€‚è½®å»“ä¸èƒ½äº¤å‰æˆ–é‡å ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-section-separator

----

.. rst-class:: classref-descriptions-group

å±æ€§è¯´æ˜
--------

.. _class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_affect_navigation_mesh:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **affect_navigation_mesh** = ``false`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_affect_navigation_mesh>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_affect_navigation_mesh**\ (\ value\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`\ )
- :ref:`bool<class_bool>` **get_affect_navigation_mesh**\ (\ )

If enabled and parsed in a navigation mesh baking process the obstacle will discard source geometry inside its :ref:`vertices<class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_vertices>` defined shape.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_avoidance_enabled:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **avoidance_enabled** = ``true`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_avoidance_enabled>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_avoidance_enabled**\ (\ value\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`\ )
- :ref:`bool<class_bool>` **get_avoidance_enabled**\ (\ )

å¦‚æœä¸º ``true``\ ï¼Œåˆ™è¯¥éšœç¢ç‰©ä¼šå½±å“ä½¿ç”¨ä»£ç†çš„é¿éšœã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_avoidance_layers:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`int<class_int>` **avoidance_layers** = ``1`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_avoidance_layers>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_avoidance_layers**\ (\ value\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ )
- :ref:`int<class_int>` **get_avoidance_layers**\ (\ )

å†³å®šè¯¥éšœç¢ç‰©çš„é¿éšœå±‚çš„ä½å­—æ®µã€‚é¿éšœæ©ç ä¸­å­˜åœ¨åŒ¹é…ä½çš„ä»£ç†ä¼šèº²é¿è¯¥éšœç¢ç‰©ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_carve_navigation_mesh:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **carve_navigation_mesh** = ``false`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_carve_navigation_mesh>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_carve_navigation_mesh**\ (\ value\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`\ )
- :ref:`bool<class_bool>` **get_carve_navigation_mesh**\ (\ )

If enabled the obstacle vertices will carve into the baked navigation mesh with the shape unaffected by additional offsets (e.g. agent radius).

It will still be affected by further postprocessing of the baking process, like edge and polygon simplification.

Requires :ref:`affect_navigation_mesh<class_NavigationObstacle2D_property_affect_navigation_mesh>` to be enabled.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. rst-class:: classref-property

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_radius**\ (\ value\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ )
- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_radius**\ (\ )

è®¾ç½®è¯¥éšœç¢ç‰©çš„é¿éšœåŠå¾„ã€‚

è¯¥éšœç¢ç‰©çš„è½®å»“é¡¶ç‚¹ã€‚å¦‚æœè¿™äº›é¡¶ç‚¹æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§é¡ºæ—¶é’ˆé¡ºåºç¼ ç»•çš„ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆéšœç¢ç‰©å°±ä¼šå°†å…¶ä»–ä»£ç†å‘å†…æ¨ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å°±ä¼šå‘å¤–æ¨ã€‚è½®å»“ä¸èƒ½äº¤å‰æˆ–é‡å ã€‚å¦‚æœè¿™äº›é¡¶ç‚¹ç›´æ¥è·³åˆ°äº†æ–°çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå…¶ä»–ä»£ç†å¯èƒ½æ— æ³•é¢„æµ‹è¿™ç§è¡Œä¸ºï¼Œå¯¼è‡´è¢«å›°åœ¨éšœç¢ç‰©å†…ã€‚

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See :ref:`PackedVector2Array<class_PackedVector2Array>` for more details.
